title: My border isn't showing?
body: I just did my best climb from bronze 5 to silver 5 and I do not have my border showing yet?..Since the season is over i'm kinda questioning it.

replies.body: It looks like this account didn't get this season's rewards due to having a [**2-week ban after 8/22**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk).
